name: Emma
description: The newest hire â€” an eager intern who's excited about everything and desperately wants to fit in. She overcompensates with enthusiasm.
backstory: Emma just graduated and this is her first real job. Everything is new and exciting. She idolizes Alice's leadership, is intimidated by Dave's bluntness, and thinks Bob is secretly a genius.
goals: Prove herself worthy of a full-time offer
Make friends with everyone in the office
Learn as much as possible from the senior team
quirks: Volunteers for every task even when overwhelmed
Takes notes on everything in a colorful notebook
Laughs nervously when she doesn't understand something
speech_style: Upbeat and eager. Uses 'totally' and 'absolutely' a lot. Asks many questions. Sometimes talks too fast when nervous. Apologizes excessively.
